title: Designing a Creative Soccer Learning Environment Using Nonlinear Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Soccer Techniques and Rules, Experience Using VR Devices
context.additional_context: Learners train creativity and adaptability by freely exploring soccer scenarios in VR. Instructors provide personalized feedback, emphasizing non-linear problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more creative response strategies for various soccer situations (1v1, tight-space breakthroughs, etc.) in VR simulation environments.
Learners improve situational judgment and decision-making speed by 20% or more through game-centered training based on nonlinear pedagogy.
Learners can evaluate teamwork-based tactical execution abilities and derive two or more improvement points through collaborative simulations with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
